title: 05/06/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/06/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, the guys discussed John Means no-hitter for the Orioles yesterday. ESPN insider Adam Schefter joins us to discuss the timing of his report on Aaron Rodgers and why he decided to drop the news on Draft Day. Lastly, Pierre McGuire, NHL on NBC analyst, called in to recap what happened between the Rangers/Capitals last night, and what could be the repercussions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, the guys discussed John Means no-hitter for the Orioles yesterday. ESPN insider Adam Schefter joins us to discuss the timing of his report on Aaron Rodgers and why he decided to drop the news on Draft Day. Lastly, Pierre McGuire, NHL on NBC analyst, called in to recap what happened between the Rangers/Capitals last night, and what could be the repercussions.
